description: Detects process command line patterns and locations used by REvil group in Kaseya incident (can also match on other malware)
name: REvil Kaseya Incident Malware Patterns
query: (process.command_line:(*C\:\\Windows\\cert.exe* OR *del\ \/q\ \/f\ c\:\\kworking\\agent.crt* OR *Kaseya\ VSA\ Agent\ Hot\-fix* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\MsMpEng.exe* OR *rmdir\ \/s\ \/q\ %SystemDrive%\\inetpub\\logs* OR *del\ \/s\ \/q\ \/f\ %SystemDrive%\\*.log* OR *c\:\\kworking1\\agent.exe* OR *c\:\\kworking1\\agent.crt*) OR process.executable:("C\:\\Windows\\MsMpEng.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\cert.exe" OR "C\:\\kworking\\agent.exe" OR "C\:\\kworking1\\agent.exe") OR (process.command_line:*del\ \/s\ \/q\ \/f* AND process.command_line:*WebPages\\Errors\\webErrorLog.txt*))
author: Florian Roth
